title: Ep 364 | Miss Kay Surprises Phil and Jase, and Phil Is Shockingly Blunt
description:
Miss Kay and Phil look back on all the fighting their sons did when they were growing up. Jase explains why he slept with weapons when he was a kid. Zach reveals where Jase delivered all his beatdowns. Jase had the "birds and the bees" talk at age seven after an interesting trip to the principal’s office. And Zach and Kay talk about Phil’s knack for being blunt.
